articles.description: Some of cricket's biggest names came together to raise millions for bushfire relief last summer, but a letter obtained by the ABC reveals Cricket Australia's concerns about how the money is being spent.
articles.content:
Cricket Australia has sought a briefing about how millions of dollars in donations it poured into bushfire relief and recovery efforts have been spent by the Red Cross.
